attributes.action: Allow Sheffield Market Traders to stand
attributes.additional_details:
Because sheffield town is not the same with out them.

They've been here for years and everybody is complaining that they are no longer here .
To the point where they do not come in to town as often tk shop
attributes.background: Allow trade holders to stand Monday Tuesday Wednesday and Saturday as they have done for the past 11 years!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local markets are a matter for the organisers and relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
